article: south africa 's johannesburg securities exchange -lrb- jse -rrb- ended in the red on tuesday , primarily due to profit taking following the bourse 's rally to an all-time high on monday when london was closed for a bank holiday .
abstract: johannesburg bourse ends weaker on profit taking
